main event: A witness observed a green and red glowing object in the sky for 30 minutes on 29 November 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 minutes,The object displayed green and red glowing colors,The object was observed visually without any photographs,Multiple possible explanations were listed including balloon and aircraft,The report concluded there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Mr. (Name not provided), reported through Clinton Co. OAPB.
